reviews.review_msg: Jon, please dont imagine yourself talking to a bunch of Phil scholars while you are actually informing beginners. Try to express more clearly and slowly, you are not that kind of prof who likes to see 1/3 of innocent students failing with the confusion of unique symbols,r u? An intructor who can simplify a quite difficult course shall be praised!

i did 110 in 2001-2... holy crap! this course is MATH! not phil! and i had extenuating circumstances for a withdrawal and he wouldnt let me out! the dean of phil did, but horban wouldnt. and yet he still to this day says hi to me on campus.... WEIRD GUY!
